r.s: Provides access to Amazon's retail and associate web services
r.d:
Services_AmazonECS4: * A class using Amazon E-Commerce Service 4.0 * Lookup and Search for products, Wishlists, Marketplace, customers, similar item and so on * Provide associate links * Remote cart support * Multiple locale support: US, UK, DE, JP, FR and CA
Services_Amazon: * A class using Amazon E-Commerce Service 3.0 (Amazon Web Services 3.0) * Search and provide associate links for specific ISBN numbers, authors, artist, directors, and publishers among other things
r.n: * Fixed Request #2299 * Fixed Request #4030 * Added a new class Services_AmazonECS4 using Amazon E-Commerce Service version 4.0
